channel.title: Purrr on Hugo Toscano
channel.description: Recent content in Purrr on Hugo Toscano

item.title: Iteration made easier: A case study with purrr
item.description: This tutorial will be about iteration in R. More specifically, I’ll focus on some functions of the purrr package. Feedback is welcomed. The dataset I will manipulate is from the week 22 of TidyTuesday and it’s called Wine Ratings. This dataset is very informative about types of wines and its origins as well as the respective prices and points attributed. Moreover, it’s very detailed in regard to critical reviews and information about critics.
